title: Understanding Sensor Sensitivity
text: Consider what it means to improve the sensitivity of a sensor. How does this relate to the type of analysis being conducted?

title: Types of Analysis
text: Think about the different types of analysis: qualitative, quantitative, characterization, and fundamental. Which one focuses on improving the performance or sensitivity of instruments?

title: Defining Fundamental Analysis
text: Fundamental analysis often involves understanding and improving the basic principles and performance of instruments. Does this align with improving sensor sensitivity?
